title: SCP-5050-1
content:
[[module css]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Caveat&display=swap');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Didact+Gothic&display=swap');

div#container-wrap {
     background: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Ascp-5050-1/light_bg2.png") top left repeat-x;
}

#side-bar .side-block {
    background: #000000 !important;
}

#side-bar div.side-block:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) img {
    filter: none;
    -webkit-filter: none;
}

#side-bar .scpnet-interwiki-wrapper {
    width: 0em;
}

body {
    background-color: #000000;
    font-family: 'Didact Gothic', monospace;
    color: #990000;
   font-size: 13px;
}

#page-title {
  text-align: center;
}

[[/module]]
@@ @@
------
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%;"]]
[[row]]
[[cell]]
[[size 150%]]###990000|**Item #:** 5050##[[/size]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: right;"]]
[[size 150%]]###990000|**Level 4/5050**##[[/size]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell]]
[[size 150%]]###990000|**Object Class:** GOD##[[/size]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: right;"]]
[[size 150%]]###990000|**Classified**##[[/size]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
----

[[div class="scp-image-block block-center" style="width:100%;"]]
[[image tower-5.jpg style="width:100%;" link=#]]
[[div class="scp-image-caption" style="width:100%; background-color: #000000;"]]
++ YOUR IDOL.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

----
[[div style="font-size: 1.9em;"]]
